name: Monster of Mine DEMO
description:
As a newly hatched dragon, you're on a quest in search of your mother. Along the way, you encounter all manner of creatures of the night but you won’t rest until you find your mother. 

This is a game demo of a game we hope to possibly expand on in the later part of this quarter. Enjoy!

Director and Producer: https://itch.io/profile/adi-vildorf-ad-astra
